AI.method: 采用原位和离位瞬态光栅光谱技术（TGS）检测Fe-Cr合金的弹性模量变化，结合差示扫描量热法（DSC）验证调幅分解，并通过原子模拟确认弹性模量硬化机制。
AI.result: 研究发现特定铬含量范围内（如36 at.% Cr），调幅分解后的Fe-Cr合金比固溶体更硬，弹性模量出现硬化现象，TGS可有效检测这一变化。
AI.conclusion: TGS有潜力成为评估易发生调幅分解材料的关键非破坏性检测工具，为材料退化早期预警提供实用解决方案。

title: A phase field model of the effects of dislocation microstructure on grain boundary motion during recrystallization
summary: The internal energy associated with the defect microstructure of strongly deformed crystals provides an important driving force for grain boundary motion during recrystallization. Typical dislocation microstructures are strongly heterogeneous and this heterogeneity affects the motion of recrystallization boundaries. In this study, a phase field model for microstructure evolution encompassing the evolution of both dislocation densities and grain order parameters is formulated. The model is employed to generate typical dislocation microstructures exhibiting multiscale features such as incidental and geometrically necessary dislocation walls. It is then used to study the motion of recrystallization boundaries in the associated complex defect energy 'landscape'. Results are compared to experimental observations.

AI.tldr: 相场模型模拟强变形晶体中位错微结构与再结晶晶界运动的相互作用
AI.motivation: 强变形晶体中的缺陷微结构（位错）为再结晶过程中的晶界运动提供重要驱动力。典型的位错微结构具有强异质性，这种异质性会影响再结晶晶界的运动，需要建立模型来研究这种复杂相互作用。
AI.method: 建立了一个相场模型，该模型同时包含位错密度演化方程和晶粒序参量演化方程。利用该模型生成具有多尺度特征的典型位错微结构（如偶然位错墙和几何必需位错墙），并研究再结晶晶界在复杂缺陷能量"景观"中的运动。
AI.result: 模型成功生成了具有多尺度特征的位错微结构，并能够模拟再结晶晶界在复杂缺陷能量场中的运动行为。研究结果与实验观测进行了比较验证。
AI.conclusion: 相场模型能够有效模拟强变形晶体中位错微结构与再结晶晶界运动的复杂相互作用，为理解再结晶过程中微结构演化提供了有效的计算工具。

title: Higher order magnetoelasticity energy corrections in bcc and fcc systems
summary: Magnetoelastic properties play a vital role in industrial applications. Despite being hidden behind either purely magnetic or elastic behavior, magnetoelasticity takes place in a wide range of devices as transducers, acoustic actuators, or fast response sensors. In this work, we inspect the impact of higher-order terms on the anisotropic magnetostriction behavior. Regarding ab-initio calculations, the anisotropic magnetostriction can be related to the strain dependence of the magnetocrystaline energy. Commonly, the description is restricted to a linear strain dependence in the magnetoelastic energy. Here, we derive higher-order terms in strain for bcc and fcc crystal structures. Using a simple parametrization, we show that the influence of the higher-order strain terms is negligible for the studied cubic systems.

AI.tldr: 研究立方晶体结构中高阶应变项对磁致伸缩各向异性行为的影响，发现这些高阶项的影响可以忽略不计。
AI.motivation: 磁弹性在工业应用中至关重要，但通常隐藏在纯磁性或弹性行为背后。磁致伸缩各向异性通常仅考虑磁弹性能的线性应变依赖关系，需要研究高阶应变项的影响。
AI.method: 基于第一性原理计算，将各向异性磁致伸缩与磁晶各向异能的应变依赖关系联系起来。推导了体心立方和面心立方晶体结构的高阶应变项，并使用简单参数化方法进行分析。
AI.result: 对于研究的立方晶体系统，高阶应变项对磁致伸缩行为的影响可以忽略不计。
AI.conclusion: 在立方晶体系统的磁致伸缩描述中，通常采用的线性应变依赖关系是足够的，高阶应变项的影响可以忽略。

authors: Iris C. G. van den Bosch
title: Synthesis of epitaxial \ce{TaO2} thin films on \ce{Al2O3} by suboxide molecular-beam epitaxy and thermal laser epitaxy
summary: Tantalum dioxide (TaO2) is a metastable tantalum compound. Here, we report the epitaxial stabilization of TaO2 on Al2O3 (1-102) (r-plane sapphire) substrates using suboxide molecular-beam epitaxy (MBE) and thermal laser epitaxy (TLE), demonstrating single-oriented, monodomain growth of anisotropically strained thin films. Microstructural investigation is performed using synchrotron X-ray diffraction and scanning transmission electron microscopy. The tetravalent oxidation state of tantalum is confirmed using X-ray absorption and photoemission spectroscopy as well as electron energy-loss spectroscopy. Optical properties are investigated via spectroscopic ellipsometry and reveal a 0.3 eV Mott gap of the tantalum 5d electrons. Density-functional theory and group theoretical arguments are used to evaluate the limited stability of the rutile phase and reveal the potential to unlock a hidden metal-insulator transition concomitant with a structural phase transition to a distorted rutile phase, akin to NbO2. Our work expands the understanding of tantalum oxides and paves the way for their integration into next-generation electronic and photonic devices.

AI.tldr: 通过分子束外延和热激光外延在蓝宝石衬底上稳定生长了亚稳态TaO2薄膜，证实了其四价态和0.3eV的Mott带隙，揭示了潜在的金属-绝缘体相变可能性。
AI.motivation: TaO2是一种亚稳态钽化合物，对其性质了解有限。研究旨在通过外延稳定化方法生长高质量TaO2薄膜，探索其电子结构和潜在相变特性，为下一代电子和光子器件应用奠定基础。
AI.method: 采用亚氧化物分子束外延(MBE)和热激光外延(TLE)在Al2O3(1-102)衬底上外延生长TaO2薄膜。通过同步辐射X射线衍射和扫描透射电子显微镜进行微结构表征，利用X射线吸收、光电子能谱和电子能量损失谱确认钽的氧化态，通过光谱椭偏仪研究光学性质，并结合密度泛函理论和群论分析相稳定性。
AI.result: 成功实现了单取向、单畴的TaO2薄膜生长，确认了钽的四价氧化态，测得0.3eV的Mott带隙。理论分析表明金红石相稳定性有限，但存在向扭曲金红石相转变的潜在金属-绝缘体相变可能性，类似于NbO2。
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了对钽氧化物的理解，证明了通过外延稳定化方法生长亚稳态TaO2薄膜的可行性，揭示了其独特的电子结构和相变特性，为将其集成到下一代电子和光子器件中铺平了道路。

title: Anisotropic anomalous Hall effect in distorted kagome GdTi3Bi4
summary: Topological kagome magnets offer a rich landscape for exploring the intricate interplay of quantum interactions among geometry, topology, spin, and correlation. GdTi3Bi4 crystallizes in layered Ti based kagome nets intertwined with zigzag Gd chains along the a axis and orders antiferromagnetically below 15 K. Here, we present the temperature and field dependent electrical transport of GdTi3Bi4 in different directions. The material exhibits anomalous Hall conductivity (AHC) of 410 S cm-1 at 2 K for B parallel c and it is completely absent for B parallel a, despite the similar magnetization observed in both orientations. This behavior is quite contradictory, as anomalous Hall effect (AHE) typically scales with the magnetization. Through first principles calculations, it is demonstrated that in the presence of time reversal symmetry broken by the Gd 4f sublattice and spin orbit coupling, the magnetization direction controls the orbital mixing in the Ti t2g bands, relocating Berry curvature hot spots and producing the observed orientation selective AHC. The results establish GdTi3Bi4 as platform for investigating new avenues of AHE, such as directional AHE, and thus shed new light on the intricate coupling between magnetic and electronic structures, paving the way for exploring novel quantum phenomena.

AI.tldr: GdTi3Bi4 kagome磁体表现出方向选择性的反常霍尔效应：当磁场平行于c轴时出现显著反常霍尔电导，而平行于a轴时完全消失，这与通常反常霍尔效应随磁化强度变化的规律相矛盾。
AI.motivation: 研究拓扑kagome磁体中几何、拓扑、自旋和关联之间的量子相互作用，探索反常霍尔效应的新机制和方向选择性行为。
AI.method: 测量GdTi3Bi4在不同方向和温度下的电输运性质，结合第一性原理计算分析磁化方向对Ti t2g能带轨道混合和贝里曲率分布的影响。
AI.result: 在2K下，B∥c时观察到410 S cm⁻¹的反常霍尔电导，而B∥a时完全消失；计算表明磁化方向控制Ti t2g能带的轨道混合，重新定位贝里曲率热点，产生方向选择性的反常霍尔效应。
AI.conclusion: GdTi3Bi4为研究方向选择性反常霍尔效应等新现象提供了平台，揭示了磁结构与电子结构之间的复杂耦合，为探索新型量子现象开辟了道路。

title: Influence of CaO and SiO2 additives on the sintering behavior of Cr,Ca:YAG ceramics prepared by solid-state reaction sintering
summary: Optical ceramics of yttrium aluminum garnet (Y3-xCaxAl4.95Cr0.05O12) doped with 0.1 at.% of chromium ions and 0.5, 0.8, and 1.2 at.% of calcium ions were prepared by reactive sintering in vacuum at 1750 degrees C. The influence of SiO2 and CaO sintering aids on the optical properties and microstructure of Cr,Ca:YAG ceramics was investigated. A decrease in CaO concentration led to a reduction of Cr,Ca:YAG transparency from 81 to 0 percent at 1064 nm; moreover, ceramics with lower CaO content exhibited abnormal grains and high porosity. These features were attributed to interactions between silica and calcium oxide during vacuum sintering. Two mechanisms are proposed to explain the effect of CaO and SiO2 on the formation of Ca,Cr:YAG ceramics. The first involves the formation of a liquid phase due to the CaO-SiO2 interaction during the heating stage, resulting in abnormal grain growth. The second mechanism is the mutual consumption of Si4+ and Ca2+ ions during the isothermal stage of sintering, which leads to a decrease in Cr4+ concentration. Both mechanisms negatively affect the optical and laser properties of the ceramics.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了SiO2和CaO烧结助剂对Cr,Ca:YAG陶瓷光学性能和微观结构的影响，发现CaO浓度降低会导致透明度下降和异常晶粒生长。
AI.motivation: 研究SiO2和CaO烧结助剂对Cr,Ca:YAG陶瓷光学性能和微观结构的影响机制，以优化陶瓷制备工艺。
AI.method: 采用真空反应烧结法在1750°C制备不同CaO含量（0.5、0.8、1.2 at.%）的Cr,Ca:YAG陶瓷，研究SiO2和CaO对微观结构和光学性能的影响。
AI.result: CaO浓度降低导致陶瓷在1064nm处的透明度从81%降至0%，低CaO含量样品出现异常晶粒生长和高孔隙率，SiO2和CaO的相互作用影响陶瓷形成机制。
AI.conclusion: 提出了两种机制解释CaO和SiO2对陶瓷形成的影响：加热阶段形成液相导致异常晶粒生长，等温烧结阶段Si4+和Ca2+相互消耗降低Cr4+浓度，两者均对陶瓷光学和激光性能产生负面影响。

title: Electric field switching of altermagnetic spin-splitting in multiferroic skyrmions
summary: Magnetic skyrmions are localized magnetic structures that retain their shape and stability over time, thanks to their topological nature. Recent theoretical and experimental progress has laid the groundwork for understanding magnetic skyrmions characterized by negligible net magnetization and ultrafast dynamics. Notably, skyrmions emerging in materials with altermagnetism, a novel magnetic phase featuring lifted Kramers degeneracy-have remained unreported until now. In this study, we demonstrate that BiFeO3, a multiferroic renowned for its strong coupling between ferroelectricity and magnetism, can transit from a spin cycloid to a Neel-type skyrmion under antidamping spin-orbit torque at room temperature. Strikingly, the altermagnetic spin splitting within BiFeO3 skyrmion can be reversed through the application of an electric field, revealed via the Circular photogalvanic effect. This quasiparticle, which possesses a neutral topological charge, holds substantial promise for diverse applications-most notably, enabling the development of unconventional computing systems with low power consumption and magnetoelectric controllability.

AI.tldr: 在BiFeO3多铁材料中，通过反阻尼自旋轨道力矩实现了从自旋螺旋到奈尔型斯格明子的室温转变，并发现其具有可电场调控的反铁磁自旋分裂特性。
AI.motivation: 探索具有可忽略净磁化和超快动力学的磁性斯格明子，特别是在反铁磁材料中的实现，这种新型磁性相具有提升的克拉默斯简并性，此前尚未报道。
AI.method: 利用BiFeO3多铁材料的铁电-磁强耦合特性，在室温下通过反阻尼自旋轨道力矩诱导材料从自旋螺旋态转变为奈尔型斯格明子，并通过圆光电效应揭示其自旋分裂特性。
AI.result: 成功在BiFeO3中实现了室温奈尔型斯格明子，发现其反铁磁自旋分裂可通过电场反转，且该准粒子具有中性拓扑电荷。
AI.conclusion: 这种具有电场可调反铁磁自旋分裂的斯格明子准粒子，为低功耗、磁电可控的非传统计算系统等应用提供了重要前景。

title: Bgolearn: a Unified Bayesian Optimization Framework for Accelerating Materials Discovery
summary: Efficient exploration of vast compositional and processing spaces is essential for accelerated materials discovery. Bayesian optimization (BO) provides a principled strategy for identifying optimal materials with minimal experiments, yet its adoption in materials science is hindered by implementation complexity and limited domain-specific tools. Here, we present Bgolearn, a comprehensive Python framework that makes BO accessible and practical for materials research through an intuitive interface, robust algorithms, and materials-oriented workflows. Bgolearn supports both single-objective and multi-objective Bayesian optimization with multiple acquisition functions (e.g., expected improvement, upper confidence bound, probability of improvement, and expected hypervolume improvement etc.), diverse surrogate models (including Gaussian processes, random forests, and gradient boosting etc.), and bootstrap-based uncertainty quantification. Benchmark studies show that Bgolearn reduces the number of required experiments by 40-60% compared with random search, grid search, and genetic algorithms, while maintaining comparable or superior solution quality. Its effectiveness is demonstrated not only through the studies presented in this paper, such as the identification of maximum-elastic-modulus triply periodic minimal surface structures, ultra-high-hardness high-entropy alloys, and high-strength, high-ductility medium-Mn steels, but also by numerous publications that have proven its impact in material discovery. With a modular architecture that integrates seamlessly into existing materials workflows and a graphical user interface (BgoFace) that removes programming barriers, Bgolearn establishes a practical and reliable platform for Bayesian optimization in materials science, and is openly available at https://github.com/Bin-Cao/Bgolearn.

AI.tldr: Bgolearn是一个用于材料科学的Python贝叶斯优化框架，通过直观接口和材料导向工作流，将实验需求减少40-60%，加速材料发现。
AI.motivation: 贝叶斯优化在材料科学中的应用受到实施复杂性和领域特定工具有限的阻碍，需要开发一个易于使用且实用的框架来加速材料发现过程。
AI.method: 开发了Bgolearn框架，支持单目标和多目标贝叶斯优化，提供多种采集函数、代理模型和不确定性量化方法，具有模块化架构和图形用户界面。
AI.result: 基准测试显示Bgolearn比随机搜索、网格搜索和遗传算法减少40-60%的实验需求，同时保持相当或更优的解决方案质量，已成功应用于多种材料发现案例。
AI.conclusion: Bgolearn为材料科学中的贝叶斯优化建立了一个实用可靠的平台，通过降低编程门槛和集成到现有工作流中，促进了贝叶斯优化在材料研究中的广泛应用。

title: Nanoindentation induced plasticity in equiatomic MoTaW alloys by experimentally guided machine learning molecular dynamics simulations
summary: Refractory complex concentrated alloys (RCCA) exhibit exceptional strength and thermal stability, yet their plastic deformation mechanisms under complex contact loading remain insufficiently understood. Here, the nanoindentation response of an equiatomic MoTaW alloy is investigated through a combined experimental and atomistically resolved modeling approach. Spherical nanoindentation experiments are coupled with large scale molecular dynamics simulations employing a tabulated low dimensional Gaussian Approximation Potential (tabGAP), enabling near DFT accuracy. A physics based similarity criterion, implemented via PCA of load-displacement curves, is used to identify mechanically representative experimental responses for quantitative comparison with simulations. Indentation stress-strain curves are constructed yielding excellent agreement in the elastic regime between experiment and simulation, with reduced Young's moduli of approximately 270 GPa. Generalized stacking fault energy calculations reveal elevated unstable stacking- and twinning-fault energies in MoTaW relative to pure refractory elements, indicating suppressed localized shear and a preference for dislocation-mediated plasticity. Atomistic analyses demonstrate a strong crystallographic dependence of plastic deformation, with symmetric {110}<111> slip activation and four-fold rosette pile-ups for the [001] orientation, and anisotropic slip, strain localization, and enhanced junction formation for [011]. Local entropy and polyhedral template matching analyses further elucidate dislocation network evolution and deformation-induced local structural transformations. Overall, this study establishes a direct mechanistic link between fault energetics, orientation-dependent dislocation activity, and experimentally observed nanoindentation behavior in RCCA.

AI.tldr: 通过实验与原子模拟结合，研究MoTaW难熔复合浓缩合金的纳米压痕响应，揭示其塑性变形机制与晶体取向、位错网络演化的关系。
AI.motivation: 难熔复合浓缩合金(RCCA)具有优异的强度和热稳定性，但其在复杂接触载荷下的塑性变形机制尚不明确，需要深入理解其微观变形行为。
AI.method: 结合球形纳米压痕实验和大规模分子动力学模拟，采用表格化高斯近似势(tabGAP)实现近DFT精度。通过PCA分析载荷-位移曲线识别代表性实验响应，构建压痕应力-应变曲线，并进行广义层错能计算和原子尺度分析。
AI.result: 实验与模拟在弹性区表现出良好一致性，弹性模量约270 GPa。MoTaW相对于纯难熔元素具有更高的不稳定层错能和孪晶能，抑制局部剪切，促进位错介导的塑性。塑性变形具有强晶体取向依赖性：[001]取向激活对称{110}<111>滑移并形成四叶草状堆积；[011]取向表现出各向异性滑移、应变局部化和增强的位错结形成。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了层错能、取向依赖性位错活动与实验观察的纳米压痕行为之间的直接机制联系，为理解RCCA的塑性变形机制提供了重要见解。

title: Dislocation distribution near a wall within the framework of the continuum theory of curved dislocations
summary:
A recently proposed generalised continuum theory of curved dislocations describes the spatial and temporal evolution of statistically stored and geometrically necessary dislocation densities as well as the curvature. The dynamics follow from a scalar plastic potential that constrains the allowed velocity fields and leads to a phase field like formulation with a nontrivial mobility function. Although conceptually related to strain gradient plasticity, the theory differs by introducing an intrinsic, evolving length scale given by the dislocation spacing.
  In this paper, we determine three key material independent parameters of this continuum theory by quantitatively comparing its predictions with discrete dislocation dynamics (DDD) simulations. To achieve this, we impose a narrow impenetrable wall inside the simulation volume, which blocks dislocation motion and generates characteristic spatial variations of the dislocation density fields under external loading. We show that for this geometry, the continuum equations reduce to a form that can be solved efficiently via direct numerical integration. The resulting stationary distributions of total and geometrically necessary dislocation densities are then compared to extensive 2D and 3D DDD simulations. This comparison allows us to extract the parameters that govern the back stress, the density gradient coupling, and the flow stress relation. Our results demonstrate that the continuum theory quantitatively captures the DDD observed structure of the dislocation pile up near the wall and therefore provides a reliable mesoscale description. The wall loading setup further serves as a benchmark problem to validate numerical implementations of the continuum theory in more general geometries.

AI.tldr: 通过离散位错动力学模拟验证连续介质位错理论的关键参数，使用不可穿透壁几何结构作为基准测试
AI.motivation: 验证广义连续介质位错理论的预测能力，通过与离散位错动力学模拟的定量比较来确定理论中的关键材料独立参数
AI.method: 在模拟体积中设置狭窄不可穿透壁，阻挡位错运动并产生特征性的位错密度空间分布；将连续介质方程简化为可通过直接数值积分求解的形式；将结果与2D和3D离散位错动力学模拟进行广泛比较
AI.result: 成功提取了控制背应力、密度梯度耦合和流动应力关系的参数；连续介质理论定量捕捉了壁附近位错堆积的离散位错动力学观测结构；不可穿透壁加载设置可作为验证连续介质理论数值实现的基准问题
AI.conclusion: 连续介质理论能够可靠地描述介观尺度的位错行为，通过与离散模拟的定量比较验证了理论的有效性，并为更一般几何中的数值实现提供了基准测试

title: A survey of active learning in materials science: Data-driven paradigm for accelerating the research pipeline
summary:
The exploration of materials composition, structure, and processing spaces is constrained by high dimensionality and the cost of data acquisition. While machine learning has supported property prediction and design, its effectiveness depends on labeled data, which remains expensive to generate via experiments or high-fidelity simulations. Improving data efficiency is thus a central concern in materials informatics.
  Active learning (AL) addresses this by coupling model training with adaptive data acquisition. Instead of static datasets, AL iteratively prioritizes candidates based on uncertainty, diversity, or task-specific objectives. By guiding data collection under limited budgets, AL offers a structured approach to decision-making, complementing physical insight with quantitative measures of informativeness.
  Recently, AL has been applied to computational simulation, structure optimization, and autonomous experimentation. However, the diversity of AL formulations has led to fragmented methodologies and inconsistent assessments. This Review provides a concise overview of AL methods in materials science, focusing on their role in improving data efficiency under realistic constraints. We summarize key methodological principles, representative applications, and persistent challenges, aiming to clarify the scope and limitations of AL as a practical tool within contemporary materials informatics.

AI.tldr: 这篇综述论文回顾了主动学习在材料科学中的应用，重点关注其在有限预算下提高数据效率的方法、应用和挑战。
AI.motivation: 材料成分、结构和加工空间的高维性以及数据获取成本限制了材料探索。机器学习虽然支持性能预测和设计，但依赖于昂贵的标记数据。因此，提高数据效率是材料信息学的核心问题。
AI.method: 主动学习通过将模型训练与自适应数据获取相结合来解决这一问题。它基于不确定性、多样性或任务特定目标迭代地优先考虑候选样本，在有限预算下指导数据收集，为决策提供结构化方法。
AI.result: 主动学习已成功应用于计算模拟、结构优化和自主实验等领域。然而，不同的AL方法导致了方法论碎片化和评估不一致的问题。
AI.conclusion: 这篇综述总结了主动学习在材料科学中的关键方法原则、代表性应用和持续挑战，旨在阐明AL作为当代材料信息学实用工具的范围和局限性。

title: Percolation-Driven Magnetotransport due to Structural and Microstructural Evolution in Ultrathin Si/Fe Bilayers
comment: 29 pages, 11 figures. Experimental study of percolation-driven magnetotransport in thin films. Author-accepted manuscript
summary: The anomalous Hall effect (AHE) in magnetic nanofilms is highly sensitive to the microstructural and magnetic homogeneity. However, the evolution of the microstructure and morphology near the percolation threshold, and its connection to the resulting magnetic and magnetotransport behavior in low-dimensional magnetic heterostructures, remain poorly understood. In this study, we present a comprehensive analysis of the evolution of the structural, microstructural, and magnetotransport properties of Si/Fe bilayers by varying the Fe layer thickness. X-ray diffraction (XRD), high-resolution transmission electron microscopy (HRTEM) and magnetisation data reveal a percolation-driven transition from a continuous metallic film to percolative network structure of grains when tFe decreases below 30 Angstrom. Transport measurements involving longitudinal resistivity (rho), and the anomalous Hall resistivity (rho_A,h,s) show clear divergence near the percolation threshold. The purely electronic conduction channels (rho) evolve more gradually as compared to the combined electronic and magnetic ones rho_A,h,s. The percolative analysis of the structural, magnetic, and magnetotransport data yields a critical exponent in the range of 0.78 to 1.16, consistent with that of 2D-disordered systems. The AHE scaling relation between the rho_A,h,s and rho reveals a crossover of the AHE mechanism from a mixed intrinsic/side-jump contribution with a minor skew scattering component (n ~ 1.42) in the thick, low-resistive samples (tFe > 30 Angstrom) to a skew-scattering-dominant mechanism (n = 0.62) in the high-resistive films (tFe <= 30 Angstrom). This crossover coincides with the onset of structural and magnetic connectivity between the grains. Furthermore, these findings underscore the interlink between microstructure, morphology, magnetism, and Hall transport under a percolation framework.

AI.tldr: 研究Si/Fe双层膜中铁层厚度变化对结构、微观结构及磁输运性质的影响，发现30Å附近存在渗流阈值，导致AHE机制从混合本征/侧跳散射转变为偏斜散射主导。
AI.motivation: 磁性纳米薄膜中的反常霍尔效应对微观结构和磁均匀性高度敏感，但渗流阈值附近的微观结构和形貌演变及其与低维磁性异质结构中磁输运行为的关系尚不清楚。
AI.method: 通过改变Fe层厚度研究Si/Fe双层膜，使用XRD、HRTEM表征结构，磁化测量分析磁性，纵向电阻率和反常霍尔电阻率测量研究输运性质，并进行渗流分析。
AI.result: 当tFe低于30Å时发生从连续金属膜到晶粒渗流网络结构的转变；输运测量显示渗流阈值附近明显发散；AHE机制从厚低阻样品的混合本征/侧跳散射转变为高阻薄膜的偏斜散射主导；临界指数0.78-1.16与二维无序系统一致。
AI.conclusion: 微观结构、形貌、磁性和霍尔输运在渗流框架下相互关联，AHE机制转变与晶粒间结构和磁连通性的起始相吻合，为低维磁性异质结构的磁输运行为提供了深入理解。

title: Hidden half-metallicity
summary: Half-metals, featuring ideal 100\% spin polarization, are widely regarded as key materials for spintronic and quantum technologies; however, the half-metallic state is intrinsically fragile, as it relies on a delicate balance of exchange splitting and band filling and is therefore highly susceptible to disorder, external perturbations, and thermal effects. Here we introduce the concept of hidden half-metallicity, whereby the global electronic structure of a symmetry-enforced net-zero-magnetization magnet is non-half-metallic, while each of its two symmetry-related sectors is individually half-metallic, enabling robust 100\% spin polarization through a layer degree of freedom. Crucially, the vanishing net magnetization of the entire system suppresses stray fields and magnetic instabilities, rendering the half-metallic functionality inherently more robust than in conventional ferromagnetic half-metals. Using first-principles calculations, we demonstrate this mechanism in a $PT$-symmetric bilayer $\mathrm{CrS_2}$, and further show that an external electric field drives the system into a seemingly forbidden fully compensated ferrimagnetic metal in which hidden half-metallicity persists. Finally, we briefly confirm the realization of hidden half-metallicity in altermagnets, establishing a general paradigm for stabilizing half-metallic behavior by embedding it in symmetry-protected hidden sectors and opening a new route toward the design and discovery of unprecedented half-metallic phases.

AI.tldr: 提出"隐藏半金属性"新概念：在净磁化强度为零的对称性保护磁体中，全局电子结构非半金属，但两个对称相关子体系各自为半金属，通过层自由度实现100%自旋极化。
AI.motivation: 传统半金属的100%自旋极化态非常脆弱，易受无序、外部扰动和热效应影响。需要寻找更稳定的半金属性实现方式。
AI.method: 提出"隐藏半金属性"理论概念，通过第一性原理计算在PT对称的CrS₂双层结构中验证该机制，并研究外电场调控效应。
AI.result: 在CrS₂双层中成功实现隐藏半金属性，外电场可驱动系统进入看似禁止的全补偿亚铁磁金属态，同时保持隐藏半金属性。该机制也适用于交变磁体。
AI.conclusion: 隐藏半金属性为稳定半金属行为提供了新范式，通过将半金属性嵌入对称性保护的隐藏子体系，开辟了设计新型半金属相的新途径。

title: Improvement of a focused ion beam fabricated diamond pillar for scanning ensemble nitrogen-vacancy magnetometry probe using an ultrapure diamond
summary: Scanning diamond nitrogen-vacancy probe microscopy (SNVM) is an important tool for studying nanoscale condensed-matter phenomena. Ga$^+$-ion-focused-ion-beam (FIB) milling has been introduced as an available method for fabricating SNVM, while the probe diameter is limited to a few micrometers due to the Ga$^+$-induced damage. We report a method for improving the SNVM probes' quality, with an 800-nm diameter probe of ultrapure diamond, through polyvinyl alcohol and Pt/Pd capping, followed by UV/ozone exposure. The effectiveness of the method is confirmed by NVs' spin-coherence property measurements and magnetic domain structure imaging with a few-hundred-nanometer resolution and a 6.7 $μ$T/Hz$^{1/2}$ sensitivity.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种改进金刚石氮空位扫描探针显微镜(SNVM)探针质量的方法，通过PVA和Pt/Pd覆盖层结合UV/臭氧处理，制备出直径800纳米的超纯金刚石探针，显著提升了探针性能。
AI.motivation: 传统Ga+离子聚焦离子束(FIB)制备的SNVM探针由于Ga+诱导损伤，直径限制在几微米级别，这限制了探针的分辨率和灵敏度，需要开发新的制备方法来减小探针尺寸并提高质量。
AI.method: 采用聚维酮(PVA)和Pt/Pd覆盖层保护金刚石表面，随后进行UV/臭氧暴露处理，制备出直径800纳米的超纯金刚石SNVM探针。
AI.result: 成功制备出直径800纳米的超纯金刚石探针，通过NV中心自旋相干性测量验证了方法有效性，实现了数百纳米分辨率的磁畴结构成像，灵敏度达到6.7 μT/Hz^{1/2}。
AI.conclusion: 该方法显著改善了SNVM探针的质量，突破了传统FIB制备的尺寸限制，为纳米尺度凝聚态物理研究提供了更高性能的探测工具。

title: Thermodynamic Driving Force Activated Phonon Scattering in InN
summary: Defect related disorder during InN growth is a major challenge for making high performance electronic and optoelectronic devices. This is partly because film quality is often described using reactor specific settings instead of general physical variables. In this study, we show that plasma assisted MOCVD growth of InN can be described using a single thermodynamic driving force coordinate. This coordinate brings together growth kinetics, defect sensitive Raman response and structural coherence across different process conditions. When we use this coordinate, the incorporation rate follows a universal activated trend with a kinetic scale of about 0.08 eV. Raman measurements show a clear crossover between a defect sparse and a defect rich regime, a disorder activated Raman metric increases quickly after the crossover, while an A1-LO control metric stays mostly the same. This suggests that short range lattice disorder, not long range polar coupling, dominates the defect activation process. X-ray diffraction shows that the out of plane coherence length stays the same for samples with the same driving force, even if reactor settings are very different. This supports the idea that structural coherence is organized by thermodynamics in this growth window. Finally, a simple kinetic Monte Carlo model using driving force biased incorporation and defect activation events matches the observed exponential trends and the two regimes, supporting the driving force approach. These results show that a transferable driving force coordinate can be used for plasma assisted InN growth and offer a quantitative way to achieve defect sparse growth conditions.

AI.tldr: 研究者开发了一个基于热力学驱动力的统一坐标来描述InN的等离子体辅助MOCVD生长，该坐标能整合生长动力学、缺陷敏感拉曼响应和结构相干性，为缺陷稀疏生长条件提供了定量方法。
AI.motivation: InN生长过程中的缺陷相关无序是制造高性能电子和光电器件的主要挑战，因为薄膜质量通常使用反应器特定设置而非通用物理变量来描述。
AI.method: 使用单一热力学驱动力坐标描述等离子体辅助MOCVD生长InN，结合拉曼光谱测量缺陷响应，X射线衍射分析结构相干性，并建立动力学蒙特卡洛模型验证。
AI.result: 发现掺入速率遵循具有约0.08 eV动力学尺度的普遍激活趋势；拉曼测量显示缺陷稀疏和缺陷丰富区域之间的明显交叉；X射线衍射显示相同驱动力下样品具有相同的面外相干长度；动力学蒙特卡洛模型匹配观察到的指数趋势和两个区域。
AI.conclusion: 热力学驱动力坐标可用于等离子体辅助InN生长，为缺陷稀疏生长条件提供了可转移的定量方法，表明短程晶格无序而非长程极性耦合主导缺陷激活过程。

title: Emergent Cooperative Superstructures via Order-Disorder Kinetics in Molecule-Intercalated NbSe2
summary: The design of quantum states at heterointerfaces has enabled a variety of emergent phenomena. Among them, molecular intercalation superlattices have attracted attention as tunable hybrid materials, formed by inserting organic molecules into van der Waals crystals, where molecular structure and chemistry provide new degrees of freedom. Traditionally, the intercalated molecules have been regarded as inactive spacers, while possible molecular ordering and its impact on the host lattice have remained largely unexplored. Here, we report the discovery of a cooperative superstructure (CSS) phase in molecule intercalated NbSe2, where ordering of the guest molecules induce a concomitant superstructure in the NbSe2 host lattice, characterized by a moiré structure due to incommensurability between the molecular layer and the inorganic lattice. Synchrotron X-ray diffraction reveals the emergence of CSS phase, accompanied by crystal symmetry lowering. Complementary resistivity and thermal-quench measurements show that the transition is governed by unusually slow order-disorder kinetics, so that the CSS phase can be selectively accessed under standard laboratory cooling rates. This kinetic behavior arises from slow molecular dynamics coupled to the host lattice, contrasting with fast charge or magnetic ordering in inorganic solids. Our findings establish molecular ordering as a route for engineering heterointerfaces, enabling thermally programmable superstructures.

AI.tldr: 在分子插层NbSe₂中发现合作超结构相，其中分子有序化诱导无机晶格产生伴随超结构，形成摩尔图案，具有异常缓慢的动力学特性。
AI.motivation: 传统上插层分子被视为非活性间隔物，分子有序化及其对主体晶格的影响尚未充分探索。研究分子有序化作为调控异质界面的新途径。
AI.method: 使用同步辐射X射线衍射研究分子插层NbSe₂的结构相变，辅以电阻率和热淬火测量分析相变动力学。
AI.result: 发现合作超结构相，分子有序化诱导NbSe₂晶格产生伴随超结构，形成摩尔图案，晶体对称性降低。相变受异常缓慢的序-无序动力学控制，可通过标准实验室冷却速率选择性访问CSS相。
AI.conclusion: 分子有序化是调控异质界面的新途径，可实现热可编程超结构，为设计新型混合材料提供新自由度。

title: Effect of the parameters of bimodal microstructure on the mechanical properties of alumina: A case of sintering regime effects
summary: The effect of sintering regimes on the density, microstructure parameters, and mechanical properties of Al2O3 and Al2O3 + 0.25%MgO ceramics has been investigated. The ceramics were sintered in three regimes: Regime I - heating at a constant rate (2.5, 5, 10, 20 C/min) up to the temperature T=1650C; Regime II - heating with a varied heating rate up to 1565C with the duration corresponding to sintering at the heating rate of 10 C/min in Regime I followed by a three-fold decrease in the shrinkage rate; Regime III - two-stage sintering: heating according to Regime II up to the temperature T1+1550C, then lowering the temperature down to T2 = 1300-1500C and holding for 3 h at the T2. The sintering regimes were chosen so that the ceramics had the relative density of 97-99% and a bimodal distribution of the microstructure parameters. The Al2O3 and Al2O3 + 0.25%MgO ceramics obtained in Regimes I-III had a microstructure with abnormally large grains in a fine-grained matrix. The sizes and volume fractions of the large grains depended on the sintering regime. Most abnormally large grains had elongated shapes that leads to deviations in the crack propagation trajectories from the straight line. The optimal parameters of the bimodal microstructure parameters distribution providing enhanced mechanical properties of the ceramics (hardness, indentation fracture toughness, ultimate strength) have been determined.

AI.tldr: 研究不同烧结制度对Al2O3及Al2O3+0.25%MgO陶瓷的密度、微观结构和力学性能的影响，确定获得双峰分布微观结构的最佳参数。
AI.motivation: 探索通过控制烧结制度来调控陶瓷微观结构，特别是形成双峰分布（异常大晶粒分布在细晶基体中），以提高陶瓷的力学性能。
AI.method: 采用三种烧结制度：I-恒定升温速率（2.5-20°C/min）至1650°C；II-变升温速率至1565°C，然后三倍降低收缩速率；III-两阶段烧结：先按制度II加热至1550°C，然后降温至1300-1500°C并保温3小时。所有制度均使陶瓷达到97-99%相对密度。
AI.result: 所有制度均获得双峰分布微观结构（异常大晶粒分布在细晶基体中）。大晶粒尺寸和体积分数随烧结制度变化，多数呈伸长形状，导致裂纹扩展轨迹偏离直线。确定了提供增强力学性能（硬度、压痕断裂韧性、极限强度）的最佳双峰微观结构参数。
AI.conclusion: 通过优化烧结制度可以调控Al2O3陶瓷的微观结构，形成特定的双峰分布，从而显著提高陶瓷的力学性能，为高性能陶瓷材料设计提供了有效途径。

title: Analysis of contributions of plastic deformation and intergranular corrosion to corrosion-fatigue failure of Al-Mg alloys
summary: The article presents the results of corrosion-fatigue tests of industrial Al-Mg alloys were conducted in air and in a 3% NaCl aqueous solution. Fatigue curves can be characterized using the Basquin equation and the plastic deformation model at the crack tip. It has been demonstrated that the primary contributions to corrosion-fatigue failure in the Al-Mg alloys at low stresses are made by the process of pitting and intergranular corrosion, and by the plastic deformation at high stresses.

AI.tldr: 研究工业Al-Mg合金在空气和3% NaCl溶液中的腐蚀疲劳行为，发现低应力下点蚀和晶间腐蚀主导失效，高应力下塑性变形起主要作用
AI.motivation: 研究Al-Mg合金在腐蚀环境下的疲劳性能，了解腐蚀疲劳失效机制，为工程应用提供理论依据
AI.method: 在空气和3% NaCl水溶液中进行腐蚀疲劳试验，使用Basquin方程和裂纹尖端塑性变形模型表征疲劳曲线
AI.result: Al-Mg合金在低应力下腐蚀疲劳失效主要由点蚀和晶间腐蚀过程贡献，高应力下主要由塑性变形贡献
AI.conclusion: Al-Mg合金的腐蚀疲劳失效机制具有应力依赖性，不同应力水平下主导失效机制不同

title: High isothermal magnetocaloric effect in La(Fe,Si)13 based alloys
summary: This work investigates the magnetocaloric effect (MCE) in LaFe_{11.6}Si_{1.4} and LaFe_{11.78}Mn_{0.41}Si_{1.32}H_{1.6} alloys under adiabatic ΔT and isothermal ΔQ conditions in a magnetic field of μ_{0}H = 1.8 T. The studied samples exhibited high reproducibility of the ΔQ-effect upon cyclic magnetic field application, which is of critical importance for magnetic cooling systems.The LaFe_{11.78}Mn_{0.41}Si_{1.32}H_{1.6} alloy demonstrate high values of the isothermal MCE, with a maximum ΔQ = 3400 J/kg in a magnetic field of μ0H = 1.8 T near the Curie temperature (TC) of 275 K. This value is 2.5 times higher than the well-known corresponding values for pure Gd at room temperature. Furthermore, the structural and magnetic properties of LaFe13-xSix-based alloys with Cr and Co additions were investigated using density functional theory calcula-tions. It was shown that the addition of Cr leads to a decrease in the equilibrium volume, i.e., to a com-pression of the crystal lattice, whereas Co addition causes its expansion. These changes are expected to increase or decrease the T_{C}, respectively.

AI.tldr: 研究LaFeSi基合金的磁热效应，发现LaFeMnSiH合金在1.8T磁场下具有高达3400J/kg的等温磁热效应值，比纯Gd高2.5倍，且循环稳定性好。
AI.motivation: 研究LaFeSi基合金的磁热效应，评估其在磁制冷系统中的实际应用潜力，特别是循环稳定性和磁热效应值。
AI.method: 在1.8T磁场下测量LaFe11.6Si1.4和LaFe11.78Mn0.41Si1.32H1.6合金的绝热ΔT和等温ΔQ磁热效应；使用密度泛函理论研究Cr和Co添加对LaFe13-xSix基合金结构磁性的影响。
AI.result: LaFeMnSiH合金在275K居里温度附近表现出最大ΔQ=3400J/kg的等温磁热效应，比室温纯Gd高2.5倍；样品在循环磁场应用中表现出高可重复性；DFT计算显示Cr添加压缩晶格，Co添加扩张晶格，分别预期降低和提高居里温度。
AI.conclusion: LaFeMnSiH合金具有优异的磁热效应性能和循环稳定性，是磁制冷系统的有前景材料；通过元素添加可调控合金的晶格参数和居里温度。

title: Structure-Property Relationship in Zinc Sulphide Nanoparticles Synthesized by Hydrothermal and Co-precipitation Methods
summary: Zinc sulphide (ZnS) is a non-toxic, wide-bandgap II-VI semiconductor well known for its optoelectronic properties and environmental friendliness. Conventional syntheses of ZnS quantum dots (QDs) often involve high temperatures or toxic reagents. This study presents a comparative investigation of hydrothermal and co-precipitation synthesis routes for ZnS QDs, emphasizing scalable, environmentally friendly production under mild conditions. Using polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP) or polyethylene glycol (PEG) as capping agents, we achieved precise control over particle size, optical properties, and particle size distribution. Room temperature co-precipitation produced monodisperse ZnS QDs with crystallite size as small as 2.03 nm, while hydrothermal synthesis at elevated temperature yielded larger crystals exceeding ~6 nm. X-ray diffraction confirmed zinc-blende crystal structure in all samples, with lattice parameter shifts and peak broadening reflecting nanoscale effects. UV-Visible spectroscopy revealed tuneable optical band gaps from 3.60 eV to 3.80 eV, corresponding to strong quantum confinement in smaller particles. FTIR and DLS analyses verified effective surface capping and particle size distribution, with PVP providing greater growth suppression and stability than PEG. These results demonstrate that ambient, polymer-assisted co precipitation enables low-toxicity, energy-efficient synthesis of high-quality ZnS QDs, offering a viable route toward sustainable and scalable nanoparticle production for optoelectronic and nanomaterial applications

AI.tldr: 比较水热法和共沉淀法合成ZnS量子点，发现室温共沉淀法可制备单分散小尺寸量子点（~2.03 nm），具有可调光学带隙和良好稳定性
AI.motivation: 传统ZnS量子点合成方法通常需要高温或使用有毒试剂，本研究旨在开发温和、环保、可规模化的合成方法
AI.method: 采用水热法和共沉淀法两种路线合成ZnS量子点，使用PVP或PEG作为封端剂控制粒子尺寸和分布
AI.result: 室温共沉淀法可制备单分散ZnS量子点（~2.03 nm），水热法得到较大晶体（>6 nm）；光学带隙在3.60-3.80 eV可调；PVP比PEG提供更好的生长抑制和稳定性
AI.conclusion: 聚合物辅助的室温共沉淀法是一种低毒性、节能的高质量ZnS量子点合成方法，为可持续、可规模化的纳米颗粒生产提供了可行途径

title: Noise2Void for Denoising Atomic Resolution Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy Images
summary: The Noise2Void technique is demonstrated for successful denoising of atomic-resolution scanning transmission electron microscopy (STEM) images. The technique is applied to denoising atomic resolution images and videos of gold adatoms on a graphene surface within a graphene liquid cell, with the denoised experimental data qualitatively demonstrating improved visibility of both the Au adatoms and the graphene lattice. The denoising performance is quantified by comparison to similar simulated data and the approach is found to significantly outperform both total variation and simple Gaussian blurring. Compared to other denoising methods, the Noise2Void technique has the combined advantages that it requires no manual intervention during training or denoising, no prior knowledge of the sample and is compatible with real time data acquisition rates of at least 45 frames per second.

AI.tldr: Noise2Void技术成功应用于原子分辨率STEM图像去噪，在石墨烯液胞中的金原子图像和视频上表现出色，优于传统方法，无需人工干预和先验知识，支持实时处理。
AI.motivation: 原子分辨率扫描透射电子显微镜（STEM）图像常受噪声干扰，影响对材料原子结构的观察。传统去噪方法需要人工干预或先验知识，限制了实时应用。需要一种无需人工干预、无需样本先验知识且能实时处理的高效去噪方法。
AI.method: 采用Noise2Void深度学习去噪技术，该技术基于自监督学习，无需干净图像作为训练目标。将技术应用于石墨烯液胞中金原子的原子分辨率STEM图像和视频去噪，通过模拟数据进行性能量化评估。
AI.result: Noise2Void显著提高了金原子和石墨烯晶格的可见度，在量化评估中明显优于总变差去噪和高斯模糊方法。技术无需训练或去噪过程中的人工干预，无需样本先验知识，且兼容至少45帧/秒的实时数据采集速率。
AI.conclusion: Noise2Void技术是原子分辨率STEM图像去噪的有效解决方案，具有无需人工干预、无需先验知识和实时处理能力的综合优势，为材料科学中的实时原子尺度观察提供了有力工具。

title: Spin-lattice model simulations of tetragonal FePt system
summary: Magnetic materials play a key role in the contemporary industry, providing unique features with a wide application potential. To study physical phenomena and design new materials, it is important to possess an appropriate tool, a model allowing simulation of desired behavior. Spin-lattice model simulations can be used to investigate spacious systems containing thousands of atoms, while complex phenomena arising from the interplay of lattice and spin dynamics can be modeled. One of the important phenomena that can be modeled in the spin lattice simulation is magnetoelastic behavior, offering direct conversion between the mechanical and magnetic energy. However, so far, only models for systems with cubic symmetry have been introduced. Therefore, here, a spin-lattice model for a system with tetragonal symmetry is proposed, where its strength is manifested by simulation of magnetoelastic properties of a characteristic representative L1$_{0}$ FePt system.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种具有四方对称性的自旋晶格模型，用于模拟L1₀ FePt系统的磁弹性特性
AI.motivation: 磁弹性行为在磁材料中很重要，但现有的自旋晶格模型仅限于立方对称系统，缺乏适用于四方对称系统的模型
AI.method: 开发了适用于四方对称系统的自旋晶格模型，并以典型的L1₀ FePt系统为例进行磁弹性特性模拟
AI.result: 成功建立了四方对称系统的自旋晶格模型，并展示了其在模拟FePt系统磁弹性特性方面的能力
AI.conclusion: 该研究填补了四方对称系统自旋晶格模型的空白，为研究更广泛材料的磁弹性行为提供了新工具

title: PFT: Phonon Fine-tuning for Machine Learned Interatomic Potentials
summary: Many materials properties depend on higher-order derivatives of the potential energy surface, yet machine learned interatomic potentials (MLIPs) trained with standard a standard loss on energy, force, and stress errors can exhibit error in curvature, degrading the prediction of vibrational properties. We introduce phonon fine-tuning (PFT), which directly supervises second-order force constants of materials by matching MLIP energy Hessians to DFT-computed force constants from finite displacement phonon calculations. To scale to large supercells, PFT stochastically samples Hessian columns and computes the loss with a single Hessian-vector product. We also use a simple co-training scheme to incorporate upstream data to mitigate catastrophic forgetting. On the MDR Phonon benchmark, PFT improves Nequix MP (trained on Materials Project) by 55% on average across phonon thermodynamic properties and achieves state-of-the-art performance among models trained on Materials Project trajectories. PFT also generalizes to improve properties beyond second-derivatives, improving thermal conductivity predictions that rely on third-order derivatives of the potential energy.

AI.tldr: 提出Phonon Fine-Tuning (PFT)方法，通过直接监督二阶力常数来改进机器学习原子间势的振动性质预测，在MDR Phonon基准上提升55%性能
AI.motivation: 传统机器学习原子间势在能量、力和应力误差上训练良好，但在曲率（二阶导数）预测上存在误差，导致振动性质预测不准确
AI.method:
1. 引入声子微调(PFT)，通过匹配MLIP能量Hessian矩阵与DFT计算的力常数来直接监督二阶力常数
2. 使用随机采样Hessian列和单次Hessian-向量乘积计算损失，实现大超胞扩展
3. 采用简单协同训练方案结合上游数据，减轻灾难性遗忘
AI.result:
1. 在MDR Phonon基准上，PFT将Nequix MP模型平均提升55%
2. 在Materials Project轨迹训练的模型中达到最先进性能
3. 能推广到二阶导数以外的性质，改进依赖三阶导数的热导率预测
AI.conclusion: PFT通过直接监督二阶力常数有效改进机器学习原子间势的振动性质预测，且能推广到更高阶导数相关性质，为材料性质预测提供了新方法

title: Ultrafast control of spin order by linearly polarized light in noncollinear antiferromagnetic metals
comment: v1: preprint; licence: CC BY 4.0. Supplementary material is a part of this submission
summary: The non-thermal optical control of magnetic order offers a promising route to ultrafast, energy-efficient information technologies. Although optical manipulation of magnetism in metals has been extensively studied, experimentally demonstrated effects have so far been limited to heat-driven dynamics or helicity-dependent mechanisms. Here, we report ultrafast non-thermal control of spin order in noncollinear antiferromagnetic Mn-based antiperovskite nitrides Mn3NiN and Mn3GaN, driven solely by the polarization orientation of linearly polarized femtosecond laser pulses. Using time-resolved magneto-optical pump-probe experiments based on the Voigt effect, we observe sub-picosecond changes in magnetic order followed by picosecond relaxation. The magneto-optical response depends on the relative orientation of the pump and probe polarization planes, with linear-polarization dependence reaching up to 95%, a value unprecedented in metallic magnets. This phenomenon is observed in two different materials and persists over a wide range of excitation wavelengths, fluences, and temperatures, demonstrating its robustness. Symmetry analysis and microscopic modeling indicate that optically induced torques alone cannot fully explain the observed dynamics. We therefore propose laser-induced formation of transient spin-spiral states as a possible excitation mechanism.

AI.tldr: 该论文报道了在线性偏振飞秒激光脉冲驱动下，非共线反铁磁材料Mn3NiN和Mn3GaN中的超快非热自旋序控制，实现了高达95%的线性偏振依赖性响应。
AI.motivation: 虽然金属中的磁学光学操控已被广泛研究，但实验上已证明的效应仅限于热驱动动力学或螺旋度依赖机制。本研究旨在探索金属磁体中基于偏振方向的非热超快自旋控制新机制。
AI.method: 采用基于Voigt效应的时间分辨磁光泵浦-探测实验，研究线性偏振飞秒激光脉冲对Mn3NiN和Mn3GaN材料的激发。通过改变泵浦和探测偏振平面的相对取向，测量磁光响应，并进行对称性分析和微观建模。
AI.result: 观察到亚皮秒尺度的磁序变化和皮秒尺度的弛豫过程，磁光响应表现出高达95%的线性偏振依赖性，这在金属磁体中前所未有。该现象在两种不同材料中均存在，并在宽波长、能量密度和温度范围内保持稳定。
AI.conclusion: 光学诱导力矩无法完全解释观测到的动力学行为，因此提出激光诱导瞬态自旋螺旋态形成作为可能的激发机制。这一发现为非热光学控制磁性提供了新途径，对超快、高效信息技术具有重要意义。

title: Resolving the energy alignment between methylammonium lead iodide and C60: an in-situ photoelectron spectroscopy study
summary: Understanding and controlling the energy level alignment at interfaces between lead halide perovskites and electron transport layers is crucial for optimizing charge extraction by minimizing recombination losses in high-efficiency perovskite solar cells. In this work, we investigated the energy level alignment of C60 on in-situ cleaved MAPbI3 single crystals in multiple repeat experiments using photoelectron spectroscopy aiming to resolve inconsistencies reported in earlier studies. Our results show that both materials remain chemically stable upon interface formation, the strong reactions typically seen when metals contact perovskites. By analyzing Pb 4f and C 1s core level positions in detail, we determined that C60 consistently exhibits a downward energy shift toward MAPbI3, which works against efficient charge extraction. The magnitude of this shift, however, is highly sensitive to the surface composition, highlighting that small variations may lead to significant differences in results. At higher C60 coverages of more than 5 monolayers, a constant HOMO-valence band offset of 0.52 eV was obtained. Assuming a 1.86 eV HOMO-LUMO gap, the C60 LUMO is 0.25 eV below the MAPbI3 conduction band, a value favorable for charge extraction. These findings underscore the decisive role of surface chemistry on interfacial energetics, explain performance variability in perovskite devices, and demonstrate the need to control and accurately measure surface properties. Furthermore, the observed energetic alignment can explain why further interface modification by charge blocking layers or surface passivation is needed for optimized device efficiencies.

AI.tldr: 研究发现C60在MAPbI3单晶表面形成界面时发生向下能级偏移，不利于电荷提取，但偏移幅度对表面成分敏感；高覆盖度下C60 LUMO位于MAPbI3导带下方0.25eV，有利于电荷提取。
AI.motivation: 解决先前研究中关于钙钛矿与电子传输层界面能级对准的不一致性，理解C60在MAPbI3上的能级对齐机制，以优化钙钛矿太阳能电池的电荷提取效率。
AI.method: 采用原位解理的MAPbI3单晶，通过光电子能谱进行多次重复实验，详细分析Pb 4f和C 1s核心能级位置，研究不同C60覆盖度下的界面能级对齐。
AI.result: C60在MAPbI3上形成界面时发生向下能级偏移（不利于电荷提取），偏移幅度对表面成分敏感；高覆盖度（>5单层）下获得恒定的HOMO-价带偏移0.52eV，C60 LUMO位于MAPbI3导带下方0.25eV（有利于电荷提取）。
AI.conclusion: 表面化学对界面能量学起决定性作用，解释了钙钛矿器件性能的变异性，表明需要控制和精确测量表面特性；观察到的能级对齐解释了为什么需要电荷阻挡层或表面钝化来优化器件效率。

title: A DFT study of B-doped graphene as a metal-anchor: effects of oxidation and strain
summary: In this work, we present a systematic DFT investigation of the interaction between B-doped graphene and four selected metals: Mg and Zn, relevant for next-generation metal-ion batteries, and Cu and Pt, important for single-atom catalysis. Three different boron doping concentrations were considered to elucidate how dopant density influences the binding strength, charge transfer, and electronic structure of the resulting systems. In addition, the effects of biaxial strain and surface oxidation were examined to assess their impact on the reactivity and stability of B-doped graphene. The results show that boron doping substantially enhances graphene's affinity toward metal adsorption, though the extent and nature of this effect depend strongly on the metal type and doping level. For some of the metals investigated, the interaction is found to be almost entirely charge-transfer driven, with minimal orbital hybridization. Mechanical strain is found to enable fine-tuning of the metal/substrate interaction, while surface oxidation introduces a more pronounced effect by enabling direct interaction between metal atoms and oxygen functional groups in most cases, thereby significantly altering adsorption geometry and strength. These findings provide valuable insights into the design of boron-doped graphene materials for energy conversion and storage applications.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过DFT计算系统分析了硼掺杂石墨烯与四种金属（Mg、Zn、Cu、Pt）的相互作用，考察了掺杂浓度、双轴应变和表面氧化对吸附性能的影响，为能源转换和存储应用中的材料设计提供指导。
AI.motivation: 研究硼掺杂石墨烯与金属的相互作用机制，这对于开发下一代金属离子电池（Mg、Zn）和单原子催化剂（Cu、Pt）至关重要。需要理解掺杂浓度、应变和氧化如何影响金属吸附性能，以优化材料设计。
AI.method: 采用系统性的密度泛函理论（DFT）计算，研究硼掺杂石墨烯与四种金属的相互作用。考察三种不同硼掺杂浓度，分析双轴应变和表面氧化的影响，评估结合强度、电荷转移和电子结构变化。

AI.conclusion: 硼掺杂石墨烯与金属的相互作用机制复杂，受多种因素调控。这些发现为设计用于能源转换和存储应用的硼掺杂石墨烯材料提供了有价值的见解，特别是针对金属离子电池和单原子催化剂应用。
